text: Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨmen Kam, ana kha nuianan zergi. Ana zergap, ndɨkndɨgar nza ndɨɨi, nza guigira Fhe Bakɨme kaŋgi, ana guigira Fhe Bakɨme ma. Nza Fhe Bakɨme guara phorgɨp, vhɨra ana Kam Zisas Krais, nza vhɨra ana phorgɨrga. Zisas Krais, ana vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme ma. Ana zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ nɨɨŋge ma.
